paragraphs.title: Power Iteration Clustering of Items based on Tag Jaccard Similarity

result.msg:
import org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.{PowerIterationClustering, PowerIterationClusteringModel}
clustering: org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.PowerIterationClustering = org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.PowerIterationClustering@3f9101f6
clusteringModel: org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.PowerIterationClusteringModel = org.apache.spark.mllib.clustering.PowerIterationClusteringModel@426a8e9d
clusterAssignmentsRDD: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[(Long, Int)] = MapPartitionsRDD[1145] at map at <console>:70

paragraphs.title: Convert the clusterAssignmentsRDD into a DataFrame
paragraphs.text:
val schema = StructType(StructField("itemId", LongType, true) :: StructField("clusterId", IntegerType, true) :: Nil)

val clusterAssignmentsRowRDD = clusterAssignmentsRDD.map(clusterAssignmentRDD => 
  Row(clusterAssignmentRDD._1, clusterAssignmentRDD._2))

val clusterAssignmentsDF = sqlContext.createDataFrame(clusterAssignmentsRowRDD, schema)

result.msg:

paragraphs.title: Cluster Details
paragraphs.text:
// Enrich the cluster assignment tuples with itemsDF
val joinedItemsClustersDF = clusterAssignmentsDF.select($"itemId", $"clusterId")
  .join(itemsDF.select($"id", $"title", $"tags"), $"itemId" === $"id").select($"itemId", $"clusterId", $"title", $"tags").sort($"clusterId")
  
z.show(joinedItemsClustersDF)
